title: Quick question about the Cottontail Teemo Chromas
body:
Do the chromas place different colored eggs for their ultimates?

I tried looking this up, but none of the videos seem to show him using his ult.  I could have sworn I saw different colored eggs in the background on one of the chroma pictures.

replies.body: Sadly not the case as this was one of the earlier released chromas. Cottontail Teemo in general has a few different patterns for the eggs he tosses, so that might be what the confusion is about. However, chromas don't affect the egg patterns.
